title: SU(3) Superselection via Explicit Matrix Representations

tests.name: Z₃ center structure
tests.details: SU(3) membership: verified, Commutes with generators: True, ω³ = 1: True, Closure: True

tests.name: Fundamental representation Z₃ action
tests.details: All color states transform as z_k|c⟩ = ω^k|c⟩: True

tests.name: Anti-fundamental representation Z₃ action
tests.details: ω^{-k} = ω^{2k}: verified, N-ality meson (1+2=0 mod 3): True, N-ality baryon (1+1+1=0 mod 3): True

tests.name: Color singlet Z₃ invariance
tests.details: Meson (3⊗3̄) singlet invariant: True, Baryon (3⊗3⊗3) singlet invariant: True

tests.name: Adjoint representation Z₃ invariance
tests.details: All 8 Gell-Mann matrices invariant under Z₃: True

tests.name: Superselection rule (explicit)
tests.details: Z₃-invariant O constructed: True, ⟨singlet|O|fund⟩ = 0: True, Non-invariant O detected: True

tests.name: Observable algebra completeness
tests.details: Casimir C₂ = (4/3)I: True, Invariant observables ∝ I: True
